data.lyric:
[ti:DAYWALKER! (Explicit)]
[ar:Machine Gun Kelly/CORPSE]
[al:DAYWALKER! (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]DAYWALKER! (Explicit) - Machine Gun Kelly (机关枪凯利)/CORPSE
[00:03.15]Lyrics by：Colson Baker/Corpse Husband/Brandon Allen/Stephen Basil
[00:06.30]Composed by：Colson Baker/Corpse Husband/Brandon Allen/Stephen Basil
[00:09.45]Machine Gun Kelly：
[00:10.30]Punch that motherf**ker in the face
[00:12.89]You hated what he said right
[00:14.28]Beat his a*s leave him at the stoplight
[00:16.19]I know you wanted change but nobody's around
[00:19.42]So kick him again while he's on the ground yo
[00:21.92]I'll never be the same
[00:23.73]I wanna know if I tell you a secret will you keep it
[00:26.96]I need someone to blame
[00:28.08]Take it
[00:28.86]And I see somebody talkin' with the mouth that's full of teeth
[00:31.43]I wanna break
[00:32.23]Go
[00:32.98]Fight fight fight fight fight fight fight fight
[00:38.20]Fight fight fight fight fight fight
[00:42.23]Yeah yeah
[00:42.76]CORPSE：
[00:42.91]They tried to kill me in the rain
[00:44.75]Tried to lay me down and so I ducked and ran away
[00:47.00]Put a gun up to my face so I'll f**king catch a case
[00:51.04]When I find this motherf**ker and I'll lay him in his grave
[00:53.71]All thesе f**king razorblades
[00:56.11]I wanna know if I tell you a secret will you keep it
[00:59.14]I will never be the same
[01:01.99]I been to f**king Hell but I'm surrounded by some snakes
[01:04.52]CORPSE
[01:04.92]CORPSE/Machine Gun Kelly：
[01:05.50]Fight fight fight fight fight fight fight fight
[01:10.54]Fight fight fight fight fight fight
[01:14.72]Yeah yeah fight
[01:15.61]CORPSE：
[01:17.70]Stay up bloody
[01:23.20]Stay up
[01:24.17]Machine Gun Kelly/CORPSE：
[01:26.63]I prayed to God and then I went to sleep with bloody hands
[01:29.31]Inside my room I heard the sirens from the ambulance
[01:32.11]I chipped my tooth and then I found a piece inside my pants
[01:34.64]He talkin' s**t when he wake up I go do that again
[01:37.36]I came back
[01:39.12]I wanna know if I tell you a secret will you keep it
[01:42.17]If a p***y wanna say s**t
[01:43.67]Then I'll f**kin' stomp his face in
[01:45.06]Nah not going back can't change it
[01:46.36]I left blood all on the pavement
[01:47.60]I'm on borrowed time can't shake it
[01:48.98]Uh blackout when I'm ragin' uh
[01:50.75]Me and all these pills be on a f**kin' first name basis uh
[01:53.34]There's an invisible voice that is talkin' to me
[01:54.88]And it's always tellin' me to kill
[01:56.05]I got a problem with separating
[01:57.33]What my head is creating from things that are real
[01:58.77]I'm in a room
[01:59.39]Hyperventilating and debating to pop off the cap of these pills
[02:01.45]If I get angry
[02:02.20]I'm goin' to start up a riot with people on Capitol Hill
[02:04.08]CORPSE/Machine Gun Kelly：
[02:04.67]Fight fight fight fight fight fight fight fight
[02:09.82]Fight fight fight fight fight fight
[02:14.05]Yeah yeah fight
data.trans:
[ti:DAYWALKER! (Explicit)]
[ar:Machine Gun Kelly/CORPSE]
[al:DAYWALKER! (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.15]//
[00:06.30]//
[00:09.45]//
[00:10.30]一拳打在那混蛋脸上
[00:12.89]你讨厌他说的话 对不对
[00:14.28]揍他一顿 把他丢在红灯前
[00:16.19]我知道你想改变 但周围没有人
[00:19.42]所以 趁他倒在地上 再踢他一脚
[00:21.92]我再也不会是从前的模样
[00:23.73]我想知道 如果我告诉你一个秘密 你会不会替我保守住
[00:26.96]我需要一个人来承担责任
[00:28.08]承担后果
[00:28.86]我看到有人张嘴就来 胡说八道
[00:31.43]我想爆发
[00:32.23]走
[00:32.98]战斗 拼命战斗
[00:38.20]疯狂战斗
[00:42.23]//
[00:42.76]//
[00:42.91]他们想要在雨中消灭我
[00:44.75]想要把我击倒 所以我躲闪之后 逃之夭夭
[00:47.00]枪口对准我的脸 所以我会惹上官司
[00:51.04]当我发现这个混蛋 我会让他躺进坟墓
[00:53.71]把他千刀万剐
[00:56.11]我想知道 如果我告诉你一个秘密 你会不会替我保守住
[00:59.14]我再也不会是从前的模样
[01:01.99]我走过鬼门关 但我身边都是阴险小人
[01:04.52]//
[01:04.92]//
[01:05.50]战斗 拼命战斗
[01:10.54]疯狂战斗
[01:14.72]战斗
[01:15.61]//
[01:17.70]保持清醒 残忍至极
[01:23.20]保持清醒
[01:24.17]//
[01:26.63]我向天祈祷 然后双手沾满鲜血地睡去
[01:29.31]在我的房间里 我听到救护车的警报声
[01:32.11]我牙齿碎了 我在裤子里找到了一块
[01:34.64]他胡说八道 等他醒过来 我会再去教训他
[01:37.36]我回来了
[01:39.12]我想知道 如果我告诉你一个秘密 你会不会替我保守住
[01:42.17]如果哪个孬种胡说八道
[01:43.67]那我会踩烂他的脸
[01:45.06]不会回头 不能改变
[01:46.36]我让地面洒满鲜血
[01:47.60]我的时间不多了 谁都无法动摇
[01:48.98]当我发怒时 整个世界都陷入黑暗
[01:50.75]我和这些药片 已经不可分割
[01:53.34]有个无形的声音在对我说话
[01:54.88]总是叫我去杀戮
[01:56.05]我有点问题 分不清
[01:57.33]脑海里假想的东西和现实中存在的东西
[01:58.77]我在一个房间里
[01:59.39]气喘吁吁 争论着要把这些药片的盖子打开
[02:01.45]如果我生气了
[02:02.20]我就要和一群人去国会山上大闹一场
[02:04.08]//
[02:04.67]战斗 拼命战斗
[02:09.82]疯狂战斗
[02:14.05]战斗
